wikidata_description: sovereign state that this item is in (not to be used for human beings)
most specific known birth location of a person, animal or fictional character
religion of a person, organization or religious building, or associated with this subject
direct subdivisions of an administrative territorial entity
note: There is no Freebase relation exactly matching this name. Closest matches are `/location/country/first_level_divisions`, which is mapped to P150, and `/location/country/second_level_divisions`, which has no mapping.
There is no Wikidata relation corresponding to this name, so we write our own description.

wikidata_description: location where a group or organization was formed
note: This is not listed in the Wikidata mapping, but Perplexity was able to find it.
Q111724177 is kind of close but specifically refers to arenas.
Wikidata says: "Should be ignored, reverse of https://www.freebase.com/people/person/ethnicity"

wikidata_description: the object is a country that recognizes the subject as its citizen
person or organization for which the subject works or worked
founder or co-founder of this organization, religion, place or entity

note: The geographic location associated with the ethnic group.
P115 is kind of close but specifically refers to arenas.

wikidata_name: located in the administrative territorial entity
wikidata_description: the item is located on the territory of the following administrative entity
note: The Wikidata relation is much broader than the Freebase one.

wikidata_description: the place where the person is or has been, resident
most specific known (e.g. city instead of country, or hospital instead of city) death location of a person, animal or fictional character
seat of government of a country, province, state or other type of administrative territorial entity
specific industry of company or organization
